title: ScatchProject
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with Express, EJS templating, and MongoDB. Features product listings, user authentication, cart management, and an admin dashboard for inventory control.

title: Live Interview Platform
description: A real-time video interview platform with built-in code editor and collaborative whiteboard. Connects interviewers and candidates through WebRTC-powered sessions.

title: AI Chatbot
description: An intelligent conversational chatbot built with TypeScript. Leverages AI APIs for natural language understanding with a clean, responsive chat interface.

title: Face Detector
description: A Python-based face detection application using computer vision libraries. Processes images and video streams to identify and highlight facial features in real time.

title: Note Taking App
description: A clean, responsive note-taking application with create, edit, and delete functionality. Built with vanilla JavaScript and local persistence for a distraction-free writing experience.

title: TeleCom Network Simulator
description: A network topology simulator and visualizer for telecommunications systems. Models signal propagation, routing algorithms, and network performance metrics â€” built as an Electronics Engineering project.
